name: VMWARE VSPHERE: OTIMIZE & SCALE
intro: Demonstrate configuration and management of ESXi networking and storage; manage changes to the vSphere environment; optimize performance of vSphere components; troubleshoot operational faults and identify root causes; use of VMware vSphere ESXi Shell and VMware vSphere Management Assistant (vMA) to manage vSpher; use of VMware vSphere Auto Deploy to provision ESXi hosts.Collin College - Continuing Education.
title: VMware vSphere: Optimize & Scale
description: For experienced VMware vSphere® personnel, teaches advanced skills for configuring and maintaining a highly available and scalable virtual infrastructure.

objectives.objective: Configure and manage ESXi networking and storage for a large and sophisticated enterprise
Manage changes to the vSphere environment
Optimize the performance of all vSphere components
Troubleshoot operational faults and identify their root causes
Use VMware vSphere® ESXiTM Shell and VMware vSphere® Management Assistant to manage vSphere
Use VMware vSphere® Auto DeployTM to provision ESXi hosts

textbook: VMware vSphere: Optimize and Scale [V6] – English Kit
certification: Prepares the student for the VMware Certified Advanced Professional – Datacenter Administration [V6] certification (VCAP6-DCA). Completion of this course also satisfies the prerequisite for taking the VMware Certified Professional 6 exam.
nextClassPossibilities: VMware vSphere: Install, Configure, Manage plus Optimize and Scale Fast Track
